  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/113017</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/113017</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sijajno človeško telo</string>
            <string language="en">Great human body</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großer menschlicher Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grand corps humain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corpo humano grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corpo umano grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγάλο ανθρώπινο σώμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gran cuerpo humano</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo kartic učenci ponovijo in utrdijo učno snov o delovanju človeškega telesa. Kartice izdelamo tako, da jih natisnemo na list formata A4 in ga prepognemo ter zlepimo tako, da je na eni strani vprašanje, na drugi odgovor za samopreverjanje. Potem po črtah razrežemo. Učenci se lahko učijo s pomočjo kartic samostojno, še bolj zanimiva pa je oblika sodelovalnega učenja v parih ali skupinah. Igra bo trajnejša, če kartice pred uporabo plastificiramo.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of paired cards (question -answer) regarding human body that can be used for a game.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kartica</string>
            <string language="en">card</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vprašanje</string>
            <string language="en">question</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odgovor</string>
            <string language="en">answer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">človeško telo</string>
            <string language="en">human body</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set zusammengepaßte Karten (Frage - Antwort) 
betreffend menschlichen Körper, der für ein Spiel benutzt werden 
kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble de cartes appareillées (question - 
réponse) concernant le corps humain qui peut être utilisé pour un 
jeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo dos cartões emparelhados (pergunta - 
resposta) a respeito do corpo humano que pode ser usado para um jogo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle schedi accoppiate (domanda - 
risposta) per quanto riguarda il corpo umano che può essere usato per
un gioco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο ταξινομημένων κατά ζεύγος καρτών (ερώτηση - 
απάντηση) σχετικά με το ανθρώπινο σώμα που μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί για ένα παιχνίδι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de las tarjetas emparejadas (pregunta - 
respuesta) con respecto al cuerpo humano que se puede utilizar para un
juego.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antwort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschlicher Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">question</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réponse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
